name: GovDash
headline: The AI business developer for government contractors.
description:
GovDash is an AI platform that assists government contractors with capture, proposal development, contract management & more—in one place.

Automate BD workflows across the Capture Cloud, Proposal Cloud, and Contract Cloud.

founders.name: Timothy Goltser, Founder
founders.description: Co-founder of GovDash. Engineer (ex-Charles Schwab). Stony Brook University CS alum.

# Bid smarter, win more government contracts
Produce high-quality proposals, run capture, organize your data, and a whole lot more. All in one connected AI platform.
See GovDash

![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/tlMEty4O7Mps1ef9HFvNfOgsM.png?scale-down-to=2048)


## Increase bid quality while saving time and money
Replace multiple broken tools with GovDash, the platform designed to make your business development team more effective—and happier.
Streamline Proposal Development
GovDash automates compliance shredding, outline creation, and pink-team drafts — making them easy to review and refine.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/67Mjz8xljWX2rg9RpvK4sun2yMU.png)
Find Opportunities Faster
Get personalized recommendations, surface forecasted opportunities, and never miss a contract that fits your goals.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/mtwWK0crQr6lvAz7UTOla4M5Hk.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/mtwWK0crQr6lvAz7UTOla4M5Hk.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/mtwWK0crQr6lvAz7UTOla4M5Hk.png)
Keep Data Organized
Automate contract and company data management so your team can quickly access answers and create content.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/WQ4GMrCVXlOUpVdspx2oEK8mbZg.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/WQ4GMrCVXlOUpVdspx2oEK8mbZg.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/WQ4GMrCVXlOUpVdspx2oEK8mbZg.png)
I actively use GovDash to transform a week of work into a few hours – GovDash is cornerstone to any firm looking to create a cost-conscious, time saving approach to proposal development and pipeline management – without compromise in product caliber.
Carlos Rivera - Executive Vice President at **Federated IT**
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/6iV4fXSThxjIkJ0Ga1T12p1m1o.png)
AI-POWERED PRECISION
AI-POWERED PRECISION
## Spending your time prompting? Skip to results
## Spending your time prompting? Skip to results
GovDash goes deep on workflows like compliance matrices and content generation, so you get high-quality outputs ready to use. No more endless prompting or iterating — just results.
GovDash goes deep on workflows like compliance matrices and content generation, so you get high-quality outputs ready to use. No more endless prompting or iterating — just results.

INTEGRATIONS
## GovDash works with your existing tools
Built around Microsoft products and other tools you already use in the government contracting space.
Microsoft Word
Give your writers more leverage in Word—GovDash helps you edit content, create graphics, check compliance, and run reviews.
SharePoint
Salesforce

CUSTOMER TESTIMONIALS
## Our customers work faster and get more done
Don't just take our word for it - see why top contractors trust GovDash to stay ahead of the competition.
[See all testimonials](https://govdash.com/<./customer-stories#testimonial>)
[See all testimonials](https://govdash.com/<./customer-stories#testimonial>)
[See all testimonials](https://govdash.com/<./customer-stories#testimonial>)
GovDash has proven to be a highly reliable partner, distinguished by its exceptional customer service, availability, and continually growing and adapting platform.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/I7NIXvt3ZFcCbQssvr2i3T8Ha6g.jpeg)
Kristen Glauner
Business Development Manager at Threat Tec
I actively use GovDash to transform a week of work into a few hours – GovDash is cornerstone to any firm looking to create a cost-conscious, time saving approach to proposal development and pipeline management – without compromise in product caliber.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/0nMKbHl5L1DmXsumNICqYiCbQA.jpeg)
Carlos Rivera
Executive Vice President at Federated IT
GovDash has been a time saver for Turbo Federal’s proposal team. It provides us with outlines and compliant draft proposals that are red-team ready. We are also able to generate tables and graphics within the tool.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/7uI1tlCfTY9U6oKtPKyvcLDW0.png)
Kerry Gray
President & CEO at **Turbo Federal**
As the Proposal Coordinator in a SDVOSB, this tool has changed my Life! The ability to complete a Capabilities Statement/Matrix in record time is phenomenal.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/A5OrUEvuLYfuLHRBWC7Kq0TOM.jpeg)
Bethany Clark
Proposal Coordinator at Blue Rose Consulting
SECURITY
## Keep your data secure and compliant with regulations
GovDash complies with NIST 800-171 and FedRAMP Moderate standards and runs in Azure / AWS GovCloud.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/WipJbcMbxQPAUpSkow354qRtY.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/WipJbcMbxQPAUpSkow354qRtY.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/WipJbcMbxQPAUpSkow354qRtY.png)
Compliance
GovDash adheres to NIST-800-171 and FedRAMP Moderate controls.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/e3Gm1hg4PeeIT1NZUyEa4sJmKQ.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/e3Gm1hg4PeeIT1NZUyEa4sJmKQ.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/e3Gm1hg4PeeIT1NZUyEa4sJmKQ.png)
Personnel
All GovDash employees are based in the United States.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/NNETHK7IqR5IXcD91SFeuTpRcts.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/NNETHK7IqR5IXcD91SFeuTpRcts.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/NNETHK7IqR5IXcD91SFeuTpRcts.png)
Infrastructure
GovDash is run in infrastructure that is FedRAMP compliant.

generated_description:
GovDash is on a mission to be the AI business developer specifically for government contractors. Founded in 2021 and a Y Combinator Batch W22 member, this New York City-based startup has gathered a team of 14 employees who are passionate about revolutionizing the landscape of government contracting.

Their platform integrates various essential business development workflows—capture, proposal development, contract management, and more—into a cohesive and efficient system. Through their Capture Cloud, Proposal Cloud, and Contract Cloud, they drive automation and streamline processes, enabling teams to produce high-quality proposals and manage contracts with minimal hassle.

Recently, GovDash successfully raised $10 million in Series A funding, a testament to its growing impact in the govtech space. The company is also marked by a tag on the cutting edge of technology—artificial intelligence and generative AI. With features that provide personalized opportunity insights, automate compliance checks, and allow for collaborative proposal drafting, GovDash positions itself as an indispensable tool for government contractors.

Their customers rave about the time savings and increased proposal quality they experience, and it's not hard to see why. They're not just replacing broken tools; they're redefining what a business development platform can do, making teams more effective and, importantly, more satisfied with their work.

If you’re a government contractor looking to gain a competitive edge—whether it’s identifying opportunities faster or polishing proposals to perfection—GovDash is worth a closer look. Their mission is simple yet powerful: help government contractors bid smarter and ultimately win more contracts.

For more details or to explore further, check out their website: [GovDash](https://govdash.com/).
